description: The Bandit loves traps, ambushes, and raids. If he's not lurking in the ruin he's claimed, one of his gangs is probably already on their way to you.
taunt_1: Kill them all! This time we're serious.
taunt_2: Bring me the head of that lord. On a pike!
taunt_3: Kill them all! This time we're serious.
taunt_4: Bring me the head of that lord. On a pike!
anger_1: Time to go. We win nothing by dying on this field.
anger_2: Don't let them get closer! Our fortress must hold.
plead: You haven't seen the last of me.
nervous_1: They're getting a little too close, boys... Get ready.
nervous_2: Drive them away from my castle!
victory_1: You're a pup, no doubt. What kind of defense is that?
victory_2: At least pretend you're fighting. I'm wrecking your buildings, boy.
victory_3: I... have laid you to rest.
request: Got some goods for me and the boys?
ally_death: Oh no. Ally, avenge my death.
congrats: The clock strikes three. The early morning hours.
boast: That's how it's done, see? Why don't you try it, are you scared?
help: Can't you see we're struggling here? A little help wouldn't hurt.
extra: Ah ha! So you can fight after all.
siege: My army is ready, soon another castle will be ours.
no_attack_2: Oh no? You think I'm a fool?
team_winning: Well, well... Looks like we're winning!
team_losing: Oh no... I think we're done for.
help_sent: Good to see you haven't forgotten me, me and the boys are coming to your aid.
